about_the_game:
TacticsLand


Subtitle: Radiant White Wings.

Game Features

- Authentic SRPG style.

Adopting the traditional SRPG method, it is a classic tactical game that you have tried in the past.
We brought the fun back.
Your strategic play becomes the starting point for victory.

-Various characters.

Collect cute 3D characters with 2 heads of body
Play the various stories of the characters you acquire.

-A well-structured story.

A diverse and well-structured story.
A spectacular adventure unfolding on a continent called Tactics Land.

-Various skills and occupations.

Using role-playing with numerous skills and occupations
Experience strategic combat.

-Equipment and artifacts for each occupation.

Acquire over 100 types of weapons and armor
Obtain artifacts that can strengthen all heroes.

-Various decorations

Expression, costume, and hair for each character
Decorate your character with various decorations.

- Authentic SRPG style.

Adopting the traditional SRPG method, it is a classic tactical game that you have tried in the past.
We brought the fun back.

A diverse and well-structured story.

-Various skills and occupations.

Using role-playing with numerous skills and occupations
Experience strategic combat.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura/Sonoma
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: TacticsLand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7/i9
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
